page.title: 16Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: There is usually at least one member of each community on the Community Councils. Capel Seion people would like to see a post office/shop in the area & generally people wanted a tidier area with more liter bins for the tourists. Both communities hold a number of fund raising activities either for their respective schools or chapels or for local & national charities & hospitals. Llanfihangel would like to see more activities for the children in the village. Both communities would like to see some cottage industry in the area, although in the main they prefer the villages to stay as they are.
